contents.text: Welcome to Mapbox in San Francisco, where businesses add powerful mapping, navigation, and search capabilities to any application.
For developer support and technical inquiries, press 1.
To get help integrating Mapbox SDKs into your applications, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to a developer support specialist.

navigationGoals: Connect me with a developer specialist to integrate the Mapbox SDK into our application.
I need assistance adding Mapbox mapping features to my veteran resource app.
Integrate the Mapbox Maps SDK for iOS into my Swift app and configure offline tile caching.
I need help installing the Mapbox SDK into my project.
I’d like guidance on integrating the Mapbox SDK into my iOS physics simulation app.

contents.text: For troubleshooting API errors and SDK performance, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to our technical assistance team.

navigationGoals: Help me troubleshoot API errors and improve SDK performance in our project.
I'm getting errors with Mapbox APIs in my service locator and need troubleshooting help.
Debug and fix HTTP 429 rate-limit errors in my Mapbox Directions API calls.
I’m running into API errors when using the SDK and need help fixing them.
I’m encountering API errors when fetching map tiles for my campus guide project and need technical troubleshooting.

contents.text: For sales and new business opportunities, press 2.
For new account setup and pricing information, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to a sales representative.

navigationGoals: I need to set up a new Mapbox account and get details on pricing plans.
I want to set up a new account and get pricing details for using Mapbox in my nonprofit's app.
Create a new Mapbox business account and review pricing tiers for monthly map tile usage.
I want to set up a new Mapbox account and learn the pricing details.
I want to open a new Mapbox account and learn about student pricing plans.

contents.text: To discuss enterprise solutions and partnerships, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to our enterprise partnerships team.

navigationGoals: I want to discuss enterprise solutions and partnership options for our organization.
I'd like to discuss enterprise-level mapping solutions for my large-scale veteran outreach program.
Explore an enterprise partnership for custom SLAs and dedicated support for geospatial services.
I’d like to discuss enterprise solutions and partnership opportunities.
I’d like to explore enterprise-level partnerships for deploying Mapbox in our university’s GIS research lab.
